official_title: Resolved, that during the remainder of the 93d Congress, the Committee on Government Operations shall be composed of 42 members, and the Committee on House Administration shall be composed of 27 members.

summary.text: Provides that during the remainder of the Ninety-third Congress, the Committee on Government Operations shall be composed of fforty-two members, and the Committee on House Administration shall be composed of twenty-seven members.

titles.title: Resolved, that during the remainder of the 93d Congress, the Committee on Government Operations shall be composed of 42 members, and the Committee on House Administration shall be composed of 27 members.
